title: Amstel Gold Race 2021: The Debrief with Damiano Cunego
content:
Jumbo-Visma hit the jackpot at the 2021 Amstel Gold Race, with victories for Marianne Vos and Wout van Aert after nail-biting finales. The men's race was one of the closest in modern cyclingÂ history, with the Belgian winner clinching it by 4/1000th of a second to Ineos Grenadiers revelation Tom Pidcock.

2008 Amstel Gold Race champion Damiano Cunego joined Rouleur editor Andy McGrath and cycling journalist Joe Timms to give his insight and views about the action-packed edition (and show us his bottle-opener winner's medal).
author: Miles Baker-Clarke
